name: Relief-Blue Jar with Harpies and Birds
maker: Probably the Workshop of Piero di Mazzeo
description: Relief-Blue Jar with Harpies and Birds; Probably the Workshop of Piero di Mazzeo (Italian, born 1377/1387); Florence or possibly Siena, Tuscany, Italy; about 1420 - 1440; Tin-glazed earthenware; 31.1 × 14.3 × 29.8 cm (12 1/4 × 5 5/8 × 11 3/4 in.); 85.DE.56; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
